items.title: Don’t Abandon the MMR Vaccine
items.description: The legacy of Covid-era overreach is no reason to give measles a new lease on life.

items.title: Russia Is Not a Defender of Christianity
items.description: The Russian regime is actively persecuting Christians, in Russia itself and in Russian-occupied parts of Ukraine.

items.title: Canada’s Mark Carney: Set to Fail
items.description: Though he’ll do it in a (slightly) different way.

items.title: Tim Kaine Is Unable to Say What Makes America Beautiful
items.description: A senator in need of remedial civics — and religion.
